title: Sound Effects - Pack Opening Sound
description: As a player, I want sound effects when opening packs, so the experience feels more immersive.
acceptanceCriteria: Pack tear sound plays on pack animation
Card reveal sound plays for each card flip
Rare+ cards have special sounds (different pitch/duration)
Mute button in settings to disable sounds

title: Sound Effects - Rarity Jingles
description: As a player, I want unique jingles for rare cards, so pulling valuable cards feels special.
acceptanceCriteria: Epic cards have triumphant fanfare (2 seconds)
Legendary cards have epic orchestral hit (3 seconds)
Mythic cards have full celebration sequence (5 seconds)
Volume adjusts with master volume setting
Cached in memory for instant playback

title: Card Inspection Modal - Detailed View
description: As a player, I want to inspect cards in detail, so I can appreciate the artwork and stats.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking card in results opens modal with larger view
Close on backdrop click or ESC key
Previous/Next buttons to browse cards from pack

title: Card Inspection Modal - Flip Animation
description: As a player, I want cards to flip when opened in modal, so I can see front and back.
acceptanceCriteria: Click to flip between front and back

title: Settings Panel - Sound Controls
description: As a player, I want to control audio settings, so I can customize my experience.
acceptanceCriteria: Music volume slider (if background music added)
Mute toggle button (quick disable all audio)
Accessible via gear icon in nav

title: Settings Panel - Animation Quality
description: As a player, I want to adjust animation quality, so I can optimize performance.
acceptanceCriteria: Auto-detect option based on device performance

title: Analytics - Event Tracking
description: As a developer, I want to track user events, so I can understand behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Events logged even if analytics not configured

title: Analytics - Rarity Statistics
description: As a player, I want to see my pull statistics, so I know my luck.
acceptanceCriteria: Stats panel shows: packs opened, cards pulled
Rarity breakdown with counts and percentages
Updates in real-time as packs opened

title: Tutorial - First-Time User Experience
description: As a new player, I want a quick tutorial, so I understand how to use the app.
acceptanceCriteria: On first visit, show 3-step overlay tutorial

title: Pack History - Recent Pulls
description: As a player, I want to see my recent pack pulls, so I can review what I got.
acceptanceCriteria: History panel shows last 10 packs opened
Each entry shows: timestamp, card count, best card
Click to expand and see all cards from pack
Auto-loads on scroll (infinite if many packs)

title: Card Comparison - Side by Side
description: As a player, I want to compare two cards, so I can see which is better.
acceptanceCriteria: Select 2 cards from collection to compare
Stat bars aligned for easy comparison
Highlight winner in each category (green vs red)

title: Loading States - Skeleton Screens
description: As a player, I want skeleton screens while content loads, so the app feels responsive.
acceptanceCriteria: Card skeleton with shimmer effect during loading
Pack skeleton with animation while generating
Skeletons match actual layout (no layout shift)
Loading state clears within 2 seconds max

title: Error Handling - Graceful Degradation
description: As a player, I want helpful error messages, so I know what went wrong.
acceptanceCriteria: Errors logged to console for debugging
Never crashes - always shows UI state

title: Offline Support - Service Worker
description: As a player, I want the app to work offline, so I can open packs anywhere.

title: SEO - Meta Tags
description: As a developer, I want proper meta tags, so the site ranks well in search.
acceptanceCriteria: Dynamic title and description per route
Open Graph tags for social sharing
Twitter Card tags for rich embeds

title: SEO - Performance Scores
description: As a developer, I want good Lighthouse scores, so SEO is optimized.

title: Card Artwork - Generative Placeholders
description: As a developer, I want generative card art, so each card looks unique without manual assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Unique patterns per card ID (seeded random)
Colors match dad type (BBQ_DAD = red/orange, etc.)

title: Pack Designs - Visual Variety
description: As a player, I want different pack designs, so opening feels fresh.
acceptanceCriteria: Pack design random on open (80% standard, 15% holiday, 5% premium)

title: Confetti Effects - Celebration
description: As a player, I want confetti on rare pulls, so I feel rewarded.
acceptanceCriteria: Confetti particles spawn on legendary+ pull

title: Screen Shake - Impact
description: As a player, I want screen shake on mythic pulls, so it feels epic.
acceptanceCriteria: Subtle screen shake on mythic card reveal
Can be disabled in accessibility settings

title: Theme Support - Dark Mode
description: As a player, I want dark mode option, so I can use the app at night.
acceptanceCriteria: Dark mode: dark backgrounds, light text
Light mode: light backgrounds, dark text

title: Card Back Design - Branding
description: As a player, I want a cool card back design, so cards look authentic.
acceptanceCriteria: Card back features DadDeck™ logo prominently

title: Achievement System - Milestones
description: As a player, I want achievements to unlock, so I have long-term goals.

title: Daily Rewards - Pack Incentive
description: As a player, I want daily free pack bonus, so I keep coming back.
acceptanceCriteria: Streak bonus: better rewards on consecutive days

title: Card Detail - Ability Tooltips
description: As a player, I want tooltips on card abilities, so I understand complex effects.
acceptanceCriteria: Hover over ability shows tooltip explanation
Tooltip shows: ability name, effect text, examples
Tooltips have delay (0.5s) to avoid popups
Mobile: tap and hold to show tooltip

title: Batch Actions - Open Multiple Packs
description: As a player, I want to open multiple packs at once, so I can save time.
acceptanceCriteria: Option to review each pack individually

title: Card Search - Advanced Filters
description: As a player, I want advanced search, so I can find specific cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Search by stat range (e.g., Grill Skill > 80)

title: Card Trading - Trade Offer System
description: As a player, I want to create trade offers, so I can trade with friends.
acceptanceCriteria: Trade offer shows both sides clearly

title: Leaderboard - Global Rankings
description: As a player, I want to see leaderboards, so I can compare progress.

title: Card Crafting - Combine Cards
description: As a player, I want to craft cards, so I can use duplicates meaningfully.
acceptanceCriteria: Select 5 common cards to craft 1 uncommon

title: Notification System - Browser Push
description: As a player, I want notifications, so I know when events happen.

title: Card Gallery - Lightbox View
description: As a player, I want a lightbox for cards, so I can view artwork full-screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Click card to open full-screen lightbox

title: Pack Opening - Cinematic Mode
description: As a player, I want cinematic pack opening, so it feels like a video game.
acceptanceCriteria: Dramatic camera zoom on card reveal
Best for first-time or special packs

title: Collection - Decks Builder
description: As a player, I want to build decks, so I can organize cards strategically.
acceptanceCriteria: Create deck with name and description
Deck stats: total stats, card count, rarity breakdown

title: Card Evolution - Upgrade System
description: As a player, I want to upgrade cards, so I can improve my collection.
acceptanceCriteria: Visual indicator: star or badge for upgraded cards

title: Season System - Rotating Content
description: As a player, I want seasonal content, so there's always something new.
acceptanceCriteria: Season 2: Summer BBQ Dads (30 new cards)

title: Community - Card Voting
description: As a player, I want to vote on future cards, so I influence development.
acceptanceCriteria: Winning concept added to game next month

title: Profile System - Customization
description: As a player, I want a profile, so I can express myself.

title: Friend System - Social Connections
description: As a player, I want friends, so I can connect with others.
acceptanceCriteria: Add friend by username or code

title: Card Battles - Minigame
description: As a player, I want card battles, so I can use my collection.

title: API Integration - Discord Bot
description: As a developer, I want a Discord bot, so users can open packs on Discord.
acceptanceCriteria: Bot generates pack and posts card images
User can bind account to track collection

title: Localization - Multi-language
description: As a player, I want language options, so I can play in my native language.

title: Monetization - Premium Packs
description: As a business, I want premium packs, so we can generate revenue.
acceptanceCriteria: Premium pack: guaranteed rare or better

title: Monetization - Pass System
description: As a business, I want a battle pass, so we have recurring revenue.

title: Security - Anti-Cheat
description: As a developer, I want anti-cheat measures, so the game is fair.

title: Admin Panel - Content Management
description: As an admin, I want a CMS, so I can manage game content.

title: Email System - Notifications
description: As a player, I want email updates, so I stay engaged.

title: Referral System - Growth Loop
description: As a player, I want referral rewards, so I can invite friends.
acceptanceCriteria: Reward: 5 packs when friend opens 10 packs

title: Live Events - Limited Time
description: As a player, I want live events, so there's FOMO and excitement.

title: Documentation - Developer API
description: As a developer, I want public API docs, so the community can build tools.
acceptanceCriteria: REST API endpoints for cards, packs, collections
